<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs=""
>
[Advanced Reanimated Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=3646) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #180: The Smoking Gun](/Sources.aspx?ID=125) pg. 78</row>

**Archetype** [Clockwork Reanimator](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=184)

**Prerequisites**
[Clockwork Reanimator Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3645)

</column>

---

Your corpselike construct companion becomes much more powerful and can act with limited autonomy to follow your greater directives. It becomes an [advanced construct companion](/Rules.aspx?ID=1612). During an encounter, even if you don't use the Command a Minion action, your construct companion can still use 1 action on your turn that round to Stride or Strike.

<title level="2">Advanced Reanimated Companion leads to...</title>
[Incredible Reanimated Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=3649)
name: Advanced Reanimated Companion
